thread.title: HK TERRORIST THROWS MOLOTOV COCKTAIL IN PACKED MTR, BURNS HIMSELF & OTHERS
thread.title_full: HK TERRORIST THROWS MOLOTOV COCKTAIL IN PACKED MTR, BURNS HIMSELF & OTHERS

author: farhan
title: HK TERRORIST THROWS MOLOTOV COCKTAIL IN PACKED MTR, BURNS HIMSELF & OTHERS
text:
HK TERRORIST THROWS MOLOTOV COCKTAIL IN PACKED MTR, BURNS HIMSELF & OTHERS   10:40pm Advertisement 
At least 15 people were burned or injured by a man who lobbed a molotov cocktail in a packed MTR train at Tsim Sha Tsui station this evening, Hong Kong papers reported. 
A raging fire broke out in the front carriage of the MTR where the cocktail exploded, leaving 2 in critical condition and 6 others in serious condition. 
The suspect himself is undergoing surgery for third degree burns. Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
